name: disjointed_add_one
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
ι : Type u_2
inst✝⁶ : GeneralizedBooleanAlgebra α
inst✝⁵ : LinearOrder ι
inst✝⁴ : LocallyFiniteOrderBot ι
inst✝³ : Add ι
inst✝² : One ι
inst✝¹ : SuccAddOrder ι
inst✝ : NoMaxOrder ι
f : ι → α
i : ι
⊢ Eq (disjointed f (HAdd.hAdd i 1)) (SDiff.sdiff (f (HAdd.hAdd i 1)) ((partialSups f) i))
decl:
theorem disjointed_add_one [NoMaxOrder ι] (f : ι → α) (i : ι) :
    disjointed f (i + 1) = f (i + 1) \ partialSups f i := by
  simpa only [succ_eq_add_one] using disjointed_succ f (not_isMax i)

name: Monotone.disjointed_add_one_sup
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
ι : Type u_2
inst✝⁵ : GeneralizedBooleanAlgebra α
inst✝⁴ : LinearOrder ι
inst✝³ : LocallyFiniteOrderBot ι
inst✝² : Add ι
inst✝¹ : One ι
inst✝ : SuccAddOrder ι
f : ι → α
hf : Monotone f
i : ι
⊢ Eq (Max.max (disjointed f (HAdd.hAdd i 1)) (f i)) (f (HAdd.hAdd i 1))
decl:
protected lemma Monotone.disjointed_add_one_sup {f : ι → α} (hf : Monotone f) (i : ι) :
    disjointed f (i + 1) ⊔ f i = f (i + 1) := by
  simpa only [succ_eq_add_one i] using hf.disjointed_succ_sup i

name: Monotone.disjointed_add_one
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
ι : Type u_2
inst✝⁶ : GeneralizedBooleanAlgebra α
inst✝⁵ : LinearOrder ι
inst✝⁴ : LocallyFiniteOrderBot ι
inst✝³ : Add ι
inst✝² : One ι
inst✝¹ : SuccAddOrder ι
inst✝ : NoMaxOrder ι
f : ι → α
hf : Monotone f
i : ι
⊢ Eq (disjointed f (HAdd.hAdd i 1)) (SDiff.sdiff (f (HAdd.hAdd i 1)) (f i))
decl:
protected lemma Monotone.disjointed_add_one [NoMaxOrder ι]  {f : ι → α} (hf : Monotone f) (i : ι) :
    disjointed f (i + 1) = f (i + 1) \ f i := by
  rw [← succ_eq_add_one, hf.disjointed_succ]
  exact not_isMax i

name: disjointedRec_zero
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : GeneralizedBooleanAlgebra α
f : Nat → α
p : α → Sort u_3
hdiff : ⦃t : α⦄ → ⦃i : Nat⦄ → p t → p (SDiff.sdiff t (f i))
h₀ : p (f 0)
⊢ Eq (Nat.disjointedRec hdiff h₀) (Eq.rec h₀ ⋯)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem disjointedRec_zero {f : ℕ → α} {p : α → Sort*}
    (hdiff : ∀ ⦃t i⦄, p t → p (t \ f i)) (h₀ : p (f 0)) :
    Nat.disjointedRec hdiff h₀ = (disjointed_zero f ▸ h₀) :=
  rfl
